name: Derek Collins
persona: Derek Collins is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, as reflected in his 1.55 CGPA. He often finds it hard to stay organized and motivated, leading to inconsistent study habits and low achievement motivation. While Derek doesn't experience high test anxiety, he tends to put in minimal effort and sometimes lacks perseverance when faced with academic challenges. He recognizes the need to improve his self-discipline and is considering seeking support to help turn his academic performance around.
